title: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, refer to the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/ directory. Note that the current tests may generate false positives as filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. (AJDT may omit the filename if it doesn't make sense to AJDT).
OB: The source path in the declare warning messages for .class files in injars is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. It was also observed that in some cases, the filenames do not appear at all.
EB: The source path in the declare warning messages for .class files in injars should be displayed as 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
